name: SCP: Lost in Underground
description:
- Story -

2025.

People is having ordinary days. We wake up, work, eat, and sleep.

There is a secret company called SCP Foundation. They use most advanced technologies oh the earth to contain anomalies that we call "monsters".
We have never seen any kind of anomaly. Maybe that is because the SCP Foundation is protecting us from anomalies.
And I'm one of the employee of the SCP Foundation. I'm working at Site-19 as security guard.

But a containment breach is occured at Site-19. Anomalies are escaping.
One of the most dangerous anomaly SCP-106 has escaped from their containment cell. SCP-106 is known as the humanoid anomaly. SCP-106 can send captured human into their dimension called "Pocket Dimension". An article says you can escape from pocket dimension if you found a right way escape, then you will teleport to random place.

... Where am I?

- Game Experience -

You have to escape from unknown huge facility. But many things will threat you!
And the game comes with ray traced graphics that aims high-end PCs. 

*Warning: You need RTX graphics card to enable realtime ray tracing in game.

- Credits -

Includes attribution of third-party contents.

SCP Foundation
SCP-106
Some assets are imported from SCP - Containment Breach
Additional sound effects from Zapsplat
Hand icon by Icons8
Lock icon by Icons8
Inspection icon by Icons8
Link icon by Icons8

Currently this game is under development. You will meet many bugs.
